text: "Gangnam Style" () is a song by PSY. The music video has been watched over 3.2 billion times on YouTube . It is the first video in the website's history that more than 1 billion people have seen. It has made people make many videos like it but in other locations, named "parodies". Barack Obama, David Cameron, and Ban Ki-moon tried the song's dance moves. Gangnam Style continued to be the most viewed YouTube video until August 4th 2017, months since the music video for Despacito was first released. ==References== Category:2012 songs Category:Dances Category:Dance-pop songs Category:Electronic dance music songs Category:K-pop songs Category:Music memes Category:Songs in Korean
title: Gangnam Style
